DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter study compare multiple dos intravitreal microplasmin non-surgical PVD induction treatment patient vitreomacular traction .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Multiple Doses Intravitreal Microplasmin Treatment Patients With Vitreomacular Traction ( MIVI-IIt )
DOC.criteria: Patients > _ 18 year age vitreomacular traction PVD present baseline Certain vitreoretinal condition include proliferative disease , rhegmatogenous retinal detachment , proliferative vitreoretinopathy ( PVR ) Vitreous hemorrhage Patients vitrectomy study eye time
